timeOpen.description: ISO time for when registration opens. Set to null to disable enforcing open time

timeClose.description: ISO time for when registration closes. Set to null to disable enforcing close of registration

timeConfirm.description: ISO time for when confirmation closes. Set to null to disable enforcing close of confirmation

requireEduEmails.description: Set to true to require .edu emails when signing up

maxTeamSize.description: The maximum number of members allowed in a team
